CustomField.description: Specifies whether this item is a single item, a menu, or a text item for display on a BEO. VALUE OPTIONS ARE FIXED BY DELPHI.FDC AND SHOULD NOT BE MODIFIED.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Specifies whether this item is a single item, a menu, or a text item for display on a BEO. VALUE OPTIONS ARE FIXED BY DELPHI.FDC AND SHOULD NOT BE MODIFIED.
CustomField.label: Item Type
